fields.title: Brouwer's fixed point theorem
fields.pointers:
*  [Proof of the theorem](brouwers_fixed_point_theorem_proof)
* Some consequences of the theorem:
** Every finite standard form game  [has at least one Nash equilibrium](existence_of_nash_equilibrium) .
** Loopy belief propagation in a discrete graphical model  [has at least one fixed point](loopy_bp_as_variational) .
